hypertension.definition: High blood pressure, a condition where the force of blood against artery walls is consistently too high

diabetes.definition: A metabolic disorder that affects how the body processes blood sugar (glucose)

arthritis.definition: Inflammation of one or more joints causing pain and stiffness

asthma.definition: A condition where airways narrow and swell, producing extra mucus

migraine.definition: A headache disorder characterized by severe throbbing pain, often with other symptoms

cholesterol.definition: A waxy substance found in blood, necessary for building cells but problematic in high amounts

anxiety.definition: A mental health condition characterized by persistent worry and fear

depression.definition: A mood disorder causing persistent feelings of sadness and loss of interest
